meal_plan: {"meals":[{"name":"Berry Nut Yogurt Parfait","time":"breakfast","description":"A simple, protein-rich breakfast parfait filled with nutritious berries and crunchy nuts, perfect for supporting your weight loss journey.","ingredients":[{"name":"Greek yogurt, plain","quantity":1,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Mixed berries (blueberries, strawberries, raspberries)","quantity":0.5,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Almonds, chopped","quantity":2,"unit":"tablespoons"},{"name":"Honey","quantity":1,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Vanilla extract","quantity":0.5,"unit":"teaspoon"}],"instructions":["1. In a bowl, mix the Greek yogurt and vanilla extract until smooth.","2. Layer half of the yogurt into a glass or bowl.","3. Add a layer of mixed berries over the yogurt.","4. Add a tablespoon of chopped almonds over the berries.","5. Repeat with the remaining yogurt, berries, and almonds.","6. Drizzle honey over the top before serving."],"calories":423,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null},{"name":"Beef and Veggie Stir Fry","time":"lunch","description":"This delicious beef and veggie stir fry is a high-protein, balanced meal perfect for weight loss, full of nutrients and flavor.","ingredients":[{"name":"Beef sirloin, thinly sliced","quantity":6,"unit":"ounces"},{"name":"Bell pepper, sliced","quantity":1,"unit":"large"},{"name":"Broccoli florets","quantity":1,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Soy sauce, reduced sodium","quantity":2,"unit":"tablespoons"},{"name":"Olive oil","quantity":1,"unit":"tablespoon"},{"name":"Garlic, minced","quantity":2,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"Green onions, chopped","quantity":2,"unit":"tablespoons"},{"name":"Carrot, julienned","quantity":1,"unit":"medium"}],"instructions":["1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.","2. Add garlic and sauté for about 30 seconds until fragrant.","3. Add beef slices and cook until browned, about 2-3 minutes.","4. Remove beef from the skillet and set aside.","5. In the same skillet, add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot. Stir-fry for about 5 minutes until the veggies are crispy-tender.","6. Return beef to the skillet and pour in the soy sauce.","7. Stir well to combine all ingredients and heat through.","8. Sprinkle with chopped green onions before serving."],"calories":740,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null},{"name":"Garlic Herb Grilled Steak with Spinach","time":"dinner","description":"A flavorful and protein-rich dinner that's great for weight loss, featuring deliciously seasoned grilled steak and fresh spinach.","ingredients":[{"name":"Top sirloin steak","quantity":6,"unit":"ounces"},{"name":"Olive oil","quantity":1,"unit":"tablespoon"},{"name":"Garlic, minced","quantity":2,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"Dried rosemary","quantity":0.5,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Dried thyme","quantity":0.5,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Salt","quantity":0.25,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Black pepper","quantity":0.25,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Spinach","quantity":2,"unit":"cups"}],"instructions":["1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.","2. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.","3. Rub the mixture all over the steak.","4. Grill the steak for 4-5 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.","5. Remove steak from grill and let it rest for a couple of minutes.","6. Meanwhile, lightly sauté the spinach in a pan until just wilted.","7. Serve the grilled steak with the sautéed spinach on the side."],"calories":634,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null}],"snacks":[{"name":"Cottage Cheese with Sliced Peaches","description":"A creamy and protein-packed snack with the natural sweetness of peaches, offering a satisfying and nutritious option to support weight loss.","ingredients":[{"name":"Cottage cheese, low-fat","quantity":1,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Peach, sliced","quantity":1,"unit":"medium"},{"name":"Chia seeds","quantity":1,"unit":"teaspoon"}],"instructions":["1. Place cottage cheese in a bowl.","2. Top with sliced peach.","3. Sprinkle chia seeds on top and serve."],"calories":317,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null},{"name":"Hummus and Veggie Sticks","description":"A quick, fiber-rich snack featuring creamy hummus paired with crisp, fresh veggie sticks, perfect for healthy weight management.","ingredients":[{"name":"Hummus","quantity":0.5,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Carrot sticks","quantity":1,"unit":"cup"},{"name":"Celery sticks","quantity":1,"unit":"cup"}],"instructions":["1. Arrange carrot and celery sticks on a plate.","2. Add hummus alongside the veggies.","3. Dip veggie sticks in hummus and enjoy."],"calories":317,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null}],"totals":{"calories":null,"protein":null,"fat":null,"carbs":null},"grocery_list":[],"total_price":null}
